SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) — Nik Mains registered 16 points as Northern Arizona edged past Sacramento State 62-61 on Thursday night.
Northern Arizona, which beat Sacramento State 70-65 on Jan. 24., swept the season series with the Hornets.
Keith Haymon had 12 points for Northern Arizona (8-13, 4-6 Big Sky Conference).
The Hornets’ 21 points in the first half marked a season low for the team.
William FitzPatrick had 14 points for the Hornets (6-12, 2-9).
Carson Towt added 10 points and nine rebounds.
Jalen Cone had 10 points and six assists.
